text: After the heavy losses in a recent battle, those survivors who displeased the Clan were exiled. Many have splintered off and formed Death Quests. One such group has now returned to redeem themselves - and is available for recruitment, should you so choose.

Meargh Skattach and her clan of Rancor Hold have fallen. The remnants, now fragmented, have formed Death Quests - one band has sought out the mighty Kroll and is available for recruitment, should you so choose.
The Fall of the Tendrils of Doom

Kroll and her clan, the Tendrils of Doom, have fallen. The remnants, now fragmented, have formed Death Quests - one band has sought out the mighty Meargh Skattach and is available for recruitment, should you so choose.

The mysterious far-eastern clan of the Mist Dragons has fallen. The remnants, now fragmented, have formed Death Quests - one band has sought out our mighty clan and is available for recruitment, should you so choose.

The clan of the Marsh Hornets has fallen. The remnants, now fragmented, have formed Death Quests and scattered from the scorching Badlands. One such band has sought out our mighty clan and is available for recruitment, should you so choose.

The clan of the Thunderous Sight has fallen. The remnants, now fragmented, have formed Death Quests and scattered across the steaming jungles of Khuresh. One such band has emerged from the mists once more, seeking redemption - and is available for recruitment, should you so choose.

The clan of the Fen Serpents has fallen. The remnants, now fragmented, have formed Death Quests and drifted through the pestilent swamps of Lustria. One such band has survived the biting mists of the Mosquito Swamp and is available for recruitment, should you so choose.

The clan of Hell Gate has fallen. The remnants, now fragmented, have formed Death Quests and wandered through the blighted expanse of the Northern Chaos Wastes. One such band, scarred by the fires of corruption, has returned and is available for recruitment, should you so choose.
